author: gmelachr
body:
Following presentation at PPD General Meeting: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1540186/#5-bph-update-on-bph-pag-flavor we update the BPHNano Package  to add missing variables to include B+ to mumuK*+ and Xib to mumuXi modes, increase precision to 12 and store all muons with pT>3 GeV (remove trigger requirement to allow trigger studies) for BPH Muon collection. 

This PR needs to be backported to CMSSW_15_0_X and we would like to merge it before the start of 2025 Era D

FYI: @drkovalskyi @gkaratha
title: BPH NanoAODs: increase precision and add decay modes
